= Introduction =

Minikermit is a linux terminal program for interaction with diverse microcontroller board.

Connect your board over a serial communication line with your linux pc and start the compiled c++ program minikermit in a shell.
Minikermit waits for key pressed at pc keypad and sends the ascii code over the serial line to the controller board. The controller board sends characters to the pc and minikermit displays the character at the console window.
Two chars pressed at keypad have special meanning. "q" terminated minikermit and "w"
